name: On the balcony
description:
On the balcony is a short story about thunders, fallen trees, loving shadows, and other lost fears.

When reality and ambition collided, two souls were spared for the sake of those who succumbed to a ghastly transformation.

The hasty result of a man-made metamorphosis lead to dreadful and unavoidable consequences.

Now you're here, prompted to take the last train to the balcony.
There, your loved one is waiting for you...

How to play: check everything, go everywhere, and make your own choices (more than a single playthrough may be required).
But for your first time, the less you know the better.


Minimum system requirements:

  • O.S.: Windows® 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • CPU: Pentium® III 800 MHz or higher
  • Screen resolution: 1280x720
  • Free hdd space: 500 MB
  • Free ram space: 1 GB
  • GPU memory: 128 MB
  • DirectX®: DirectX® 8.0 or higher

Consider a donation to support this and any future release.
Thank you! ❤️
